title: 38 Nabbed for Lynching in Bihar’s Sitamarhi During Durga Puja
subtitle: On 20 October, Bihar’s Sitamarhi witnessed clashes between two groups after a Durga Puja procession was not allowed to pass through a particular area, resulting in the death of one person. 38 people have been arrested so far.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On 20 October, Bihar’s Sitamarhi witnessed clashes between two groups after a Durga Puja procession was not allowed to pass through a particular area, resulting in the death of one person.

The victim’s body was later burnt in full public view by the mob.

The incident, however, went largely unreported.
